alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 2:10PM MST until January 15 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, locally up to 12 inches in the northern Ogden Valley, Park City area and higher elevations near the Heber Valley. * WHERE...Wasatch Back. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected, especially overnight tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
